pageContext.claim: “Germany is totally controlled by Russia, because they will be getting from 60 to 70 percent of their energy from Russia and a new pipeline. And you tell me if that's appropriate, because I think it's not, and I think it's a very bad thing for NATO and I don't think it should have happened.”
pageContext.analysis: Germany is not controlled by Russia, but this energy project is opposed not only by Trump but also by the United Kingdom, the EU and other nations. Russian energy giant Gazprom is building an energy pipeline in Germany. Trump says it doesn't make sense for Germany to be contributing to NATO on one hand and increasing its reliance on Russia on the other. But as the NATO secretary general said right after Trump's comment, "Even during the Cold War, NATO allies were trading with Russia."
